mapper.select: select count(1) from eas_received_info r where r.user_id = #{userId} and r.rcv_status = 'RS01' and r.check_dtm is null and exists ( select 1 from eas_document d where d.doc_id = r.doc_id and d.doc_status_cd = 'DMS02' );

select sender_id as user_id , sender_nm as user_nm ,dept_cd from eas_document ed where doc_id = #{docId} union distinct select user_id, user_nm , dept_cd from eas_approval where doc_id = #{docId} union distinct select user_id, user_nm, dept_cd from eas_received_info where doc_id = #{docId} union distinct select ew.user_id, ew.user_nm, ew.dept_cd from eas_work_request ewr, eas_work_response ew where ewr.work_req_id = ew.work_req_id and doc_id = #{docId};

select d.doc_id, aars_file_id, d.doc_type_cd, d.doc_attrb_cd, bill_id, (select bill_no from ebs_master where bill_id= d.bill_id ) bill_no, tmlmt_yn, tmlmt_dtm, doc_lng, doc_subtle, digital_yn, sender_id, d.sender_nm, d.dept_cd, doc_no, d.reg_dtm, ed.aars_pdf_file_id from eas_document d, eas_draft ed where d.aars_doc_id = ed.aars_doc_id and d.doc_id = #{docId}
select doc_status_cd ='DMS04' from eas_document where doc_id = #{docId} ;
select count(1) from eas_document d where d.user_id= #{userId} and d.doc_status_cd = 'DMS02'

select r.doc_id, doc_attrb_cd, doc_status_cd, doc_subtle , sender_id , sender_nm , doc_no from eas_document d , eas_received_info r where d.doc_id= r.doc_id and r.rcv_status = 'RS05' and r.user_id = #{userId} union DISTINCT select a.doc_id, doc_attrb_cd , doc_status_cd, doc_subtle, sender_id, sender_nm, doc_no from eas_document d, eas_approval a where d.doc_id = a.doc_id and a.apvl_status_cd = 'AS04' and a.user_id = #{userId} union distinct select req.doc_id , d.doc_attrb_cd , doc_status_cd, d.doc_subtle, d.sender_id, d.sender_nm, d.doc_no from eas_document d , eas_work_request req , eas_work_response res where d.doc_id = req.doc_id and req.work_req_id = res.work_req_id and req.work_status = 'WS03' and res.user_id = #{userId}

select d.doc_id, doc_attrb_cd, d.tmlmt_yn, d.tmlmt_Dtm, doc_subtle, sender_id, sender_nm, doc_no, rcv_dtm, check_dtm, rspns_id , doc_type_cd ,rcv_id from eas_work_request req, eas_work_response res, eas_document d where req.work_req_id = res.work_req_id and d.doc_id = req.doc_id and d.doc_status_cd = 'DMS03' and res.user_id = #{userId} order by reg_dt ;
